pushing_short.probleme: Returning short backspin serves without giving the server an easy ball to loop

debutant.description: Create backspin with a light touch and skimming contact; keep the ball low and short to prevent looping

intermediaire.description: Take the ball right off the bounce, chop down on it lightly as you graze the ball to create backspin and keep the ball low and short

avance.nom: Add finesse to your short push
avance.description: Aim the ball straight back at the net, or angle it to the side; aim one way and then change direction at the last second for maximum deception

exercices_complementaires.nom: Practice pushing short and low with a light touch and skimming contact
exercices_complementaires.description: Focus on creating backspin and keeping the ball low and short to prevent looping

metriques_progression.target: Pushing short and low with a light touch and skimming contact

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Misreading the serve and popping the ball up, giving the server an easy put-away
